channel.itunes:keywords: zinn, peoples, people, history, howard zinn
channel.title: A People's History
channel.itunes:author: Jacobin
channel.description: A People’s History is a documentary podcast about class struggle in the United States. Inspired by sections from Howard Zinn's landmark book, each eight-episode season covers one local story, told from the viewpoint of common people.
channel.itunes:summary: A People’s History is a documentary podcast about class struggle in the United States. Inspired by sections from Howard Zinn's landmark book, each eight-episode season covers one local story, told from the viewpoint of common people.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A People’s History is a documentary podcast about class struggle in the United States.
